00012 namespace ilog

00020 template <class Base>
00021 class TLoggerCompWrap: public ilog::TLoggerWrap<Base>
00022 {
00023 public:
00024        typedef ilog::TLoggerWrap<Base> BaseClass;
00025 
00026        I_BEGIN_BASE_COMPONENT(TLoggerCompWrap);
00027               I_ASSIGN(m_logCompPtr, "Log", "Consumer log messages", false, "Log");
00028               I_ASSIGN(m_verboseEnabledAttrPtr, "EnableVerbose", "If enabled, verbose messages can be produced", true, false);
00029        I_END_COMPONENT;
00030 
00031 protected:
00035        bool IsVerboseEnabled() const;
00036 
00040        void SendVerboseMessage(const QString& message, const QString& messageSource = QString()) const;
00041 
00042        // reimplemented (istd::ILogger)
00043        virtual void DecorateMessage(
00044                             istd::IInformationProvider::InformationCategory category,
00045                             int id,
00046                             int flags,
00047                             QString& message,
00048                             QString& messageSource) const;
00049 
00050        // reimplemented (icomp::CComponentBase)
00051        virtual void OnComponentCreated();
00052 
00053 private:
00054        I_REF(ilog::IMessageConsumer, m_logCompPtr);
00055        I_ATTR(bool, m_verboseEnabledAttrPtr);
00056 };
00057 
00058 
00059 // protected methods
00060        
00061 template <class Base>
00062 bool TLoggerCompWrap<Base>::IsVerboseEnabled() const
00063 {
00064        return *m_verboseEnabledAttrPtr;
00065 }
00066 
00067 
00068 template <class Base>
00069 void TLoggerCompWrap<Base>::SendVerboseMessage(const QString& message, const QString& messageSource) const
00070 {
00071        if (*m_verboseEnabledAttrPtr){
00072               BaseClass::SendInfoMessage(0, message, messageSource);
00073        }
00074 }
00075 
00076 
00077 // reimplemented (istd::ILogger)
00078 
00079 template <class Base>
00080 void TLoggerCompWrap<Base>::DecorateMessage(
00081                      istd::IInformationProvider::InformationCategory category,
00082                      int id,
00083                      int flags,
00084                      QString& message,
00085                      QString& messageSource) const
00086 {
00087        BaseClass::DecorateMessage(category, id, flags, message, messageSource);
00088 
00089        const icomp::CComponentContext* contextPtr = dynamic_cast<const icomp::CComponentContext*>(BaseClass::GetComponentContext());
00090        if (contextPtr != NULL){
00091               if (messageSource.isEmpty()){
00092                      messageSource = contextPtr->GetContextId();
00093               }
00094               else{
00095                      messageSource = QString(contextPtr->GetContextId()) + " (" + messageSource + ")";
00096               }
00097        }
00098 }
00099 
00100 
00101 // reimplemented (icomp::CComponentBase)
00102 
00103 template <class Base>
00104 void TLoggerCompWrap<Base>::OnComponentCreated()
00105 {
00106        if (m_logCompPtr.IsValid()){
00107               this->SetLogPtr(m_logCompPtr.GetPtr());
00108        }
00109 
00110        BaseClass::OnComponentCreated();
00111 }
